description.narrative: Migrant children and adolescents are able to access special protection and appropriate care options in Mexico., which contributes to Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: External Relations

title.narrative: UNICEF Mexico and Central America Humanitarian Action for Children Appeal (HAC)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Given the scale-up and expansion, this Output will be discontinued, having been replaced by three new outputs for the three field offices: Tijuana FO, Tapachula FO and Juárez FO. | Status:Discontinued | As-of Date:02/02/2022
